continuousQueries: select count(call) as sum,mean(duration),max(duration),min(duration) from /^de_(service|api)$/ where call !~ /\d+$/ group by time(5s),env,call,code into cq.5s.[env].[call].[code]
select count(call) as sum,mean(duration),max(duration),min(duration) from /^de_(service|api)$/ where call !~ /\d+$/ group by time(20s),env,call,code into cq.20s.[env].[call].[code]
select count(call) as sum,mean(duration),max(duration),min(duration) from /^de_(service|api)$/ where call !~ /\d+$/ group by time(5m),env,call,code into cq.5min.[env].[call].[code]

select count(call) as sum,mean(duration),max(duration),min(duration) from /^de_api$/ where app_name <> '' and call !~ /\\d+$/ group by time(5s),env,app_name,call,code into cq.5s.o.[app_name].[env].[call].[code]
